text: Perm State University (now Perm State National Research University), is in the city of Perm, Perm Krai, Russia. It was founded in 1916. It is one of the oldest universities in Ural Russia. Its rector is Igor Makarikhin. A mass shooting happened at the university on 20 September 2021. Six people died and many more wounded. The university name in Russian is , , romanised: , ) or PSU, PSNRU (, , romanised: , ) ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Russia Category:1916 establishments in Europe Category:Colleges and universities in Russia Category:Perm
title: Perm State University
